00057 extern short dac_translation[];
00058 #define LED_DWELL 100
00059 
00060 /* Code: */
00061 void scan_leds(void) {
00062   enum {OFF,ON};
00063   int index; 
00064   printf("Scanning LEDs ");
00065   // All LEDs off
00066   for (index=0;index<25;index++) {
00067     write_led(index,OFF);
00068   }
00069   // Scan Rows 
00070   for (index=0;index<25;index+=5) {
00071     write_led(index,ON);
00072     write_led(index+1,ON);
00073     write_led(index+2,ON);
00074     write_led(index+3,ON);
00075     write_led(index+4,ON);
00076     delay_1_25mS(LED_DWELL);
00077     write_led(index,OFF);
00078     write_led(index+1,OFF);
00079     write_led(index+2,OFF);
00080     write_led(index+3,OFF);
00081     write_led(index+4,OFF);
00082   }
00083   // Scan Columns 
00084   for (index=0;index<5;index++) {
00085     write_led(index,ON);
00086     write_led(index+5,ON);
00087     write_led(index+10,ON);
00088     write_led(index+15,ON);
00089     write_led(index+20,ON);
00090     delay_1_25mS(LED_DWELL);
00091     write_led(index,OFF);
00092     write_led(index+5,OFF);
00093     write_led(index+10,OFF);
00094     write_led(index+15,OFF);
00095     write_led(index+20,OFF);
00096   }
00097   // All LEDs ON
00098   for (index=0;index<25;index++) {
00099     write_led(index,ON);
00100   }
00101   delay_1_25mS(LED_DWELL*2);
00102   // All LEDs OFF
00103   for (index=0;index<25;index++) {
00104     write_led(index,OFF);
00105   }
00106   printf(GREEN);
00107   printf("[DONE]\n\r");
00108   printf(BLACK);
00109 }
00110 
00111 void current_output_calibration (ueac_t *system) {
00112   enum {FIND_ESCAPE,FIND_LEFT_BRACKET,EVALUATE_ARROW};
00113   int i;
00114   char ch;
00115   int parse_state=FIND_ESCAPE;
00116   int i_offset=0;
00117   int found=0;
00118   int sum,current;
00119   ueacval_t result;
00120 
00121 
00122   printf("\n\rCurrent Output Calibration\n\r");
00123   printf("Attach the DVM in current mode to the pin with the active LED\n\r");
00124   printf("Use the up arrow and down arrow keys to adjust the current\n\r");
00125   printf("-----------------------------------------------------------------\n\r");
00126   buffer1_write(0,'V');        // write the valid char to the first location of external flash                          
00127   for (i=1;i<PAGE_SIZE;i++) {  // clear out the external flash's SRAM buffer
00128     buffer1_write(i,0);
00129   }
00130   for (i=0;i<25;i++) {
00131     write_lla(i,0);
00132     write_led(i,1);
00133     found=0;
00134     i_offset=0;
00135     printf("%d@200uA> ",i);
00136     while (!found) {
00137       write_dac(i,dac_translation[0]+i_offset);  
00138       if (((ch=getchar())!='\n')&&(ch!='\r')) {
00139         switch (parse_state) {
00140         case FIND_ESCAPE:
00141           if (ch==0x1b) {
00142             parse_state=FIND_LEFT_BRACKET;
00143           }
00144           break;
00145         case FIND_LEFT_BRACKET:
00146           if (ch=='[') {
00147             parse_state=EVALUATE_ARROW;
00148           }
00149           else {
00150             parse_state=FIND_ESCAPE;
00151           }
00152           break;
00153         case EVALUATE_ARROW: 
00154           if (ch=='A') {
00155             i_offset--;
00156           }
00157           else if (ch=='B') {
00158             i_offset++;
00159           }
00160           parse_state=FIND_ESCAPE;
00161           break;
00162         }
00163       }
00164       else {
00165         buffer1_write(i+1,i_offset);
00166         printf("%d\n\r",i_offset);
00167         found=1;
00168         system->pin_cal[i].i_200uA_offset=i_offset;
00169       }
00170     }
00171     found=0;
00172     i_offset=0;
00173     printf("%d@0uA> ",i);
00174     while (!found) {
00175       write_dac(i,dac_translation[200]+i_offset);  
00176       if (((ch=getchar())!='\n')&&(ch!='\r')) {
00177         switch (parse_state) {
00178         case FIND_ESCAPE:
00179           if (ch==0x1b) {
00180             parse_state=FIND_LEFT_BRACKET;
00181           }
00182           break;
00183         case FIND_LEFT_BRACKET:
00184           if (ch=='[') {
00185             parse_state=EVALUATE_ARROW;
00186           }
00187           else {
00188             parse_state=FIND_ESCAPE;
00189           }
00190           break;
00191         case EVALUATE_ARROW: 
00192           if (ch=='A') {
00193             i_offset--;
00194           }
00195           else if (ch=='B') {
00196             i_offset++;
00197           }
00198           parse_state=FIND_ESCAPE;
00199           break;
00200         }
00201       }
00202       else {
00203         buffer1_write(i+26,i_offset);
00204         printf("%d %d\n\r",i_offset,dac_translation[200]+i_offset);
00205         found=1;
00206         system->pin_cal[i].i_zero_offset=i_offset;
00207       }
00208     }
00209     write_led(i,0);
00210   }
00211   for (i=0;i<25;i++) {
00212     write_lla(i,1);
00213     printf("%d ",i);
00214     sum=0;
00215     for (current=200;current>0;current-=50) {
00216       write_current(i,current);
00217       delay_1_25mS(500);
00218       convert_a2d(I_CONVERSION,pin_data[i].filtered_result,&result,25);
00219       printf("%d ",result.integer);
00220       sum+=(current-result.integer);
00221     }
00222     write_current(i,0);
00223     delay_1_25mS(500);
00224     convert_a2d(I_CONVERSION,pin_data[i].filtered_result,&result,25);
00225     printf("floor=%d,",result.integer);
00226     buffer1_write(i+51,result.integer);
00227     printf("offset=%d\n\r",sum/4);
00228     buffer1_write(i+76,sum/4);
00229     write_lla(i,0);
00230   }
00231   printf("Commit calibration to external flash ? (y or n) ");
00232   while (1) {
00233     if (((ch=getchar())=='y')||(ch=='Y')) {
00234       buffer1_to_page_e(0);
00235       printf("\n\rCalibration Saved !\n\r");
00236       break;
00237     }
00238     if ((ch=='n')||(ch=='N')) {
00239       printf("\n\rCalibration Abort !\n\r");
00240       break;
00241     }
00242     else {
00243       printf("\n\rPlease respond with y or n: ");
00244     }
00245   }
00246 }

00249   printf("\n\rCurrent Input Calibration\n\r");
00250 }

00252 void voltage_input_calibration (ueac_t *system) {
